message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $12000. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I've already given you a good deal at $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer you the product for $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $11000. I'd be willing to go up to $10500. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob, and I'm happy to work with you. However, I've already compromised a bit on the price. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $11500. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'd be willing to go up to $10000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. I'll throw in a small concession - I'll give you a 1% discount on the product. So, I can offer it to you for $9900. What do you think?
